content:
ENGLISH 义务教育教科书三年级下册义务教育教科书英语三年级下册 （一年级起点） （一年级起点） 英语全国价格举报电话：12315：4.90元 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语 （一年级起点） 三年级下册亲爱的同学们，新学期开始了！你们准备好了吗？ 上学期，你们了解了有关学校、食物、家庭和外貌特征等方面的知识， 学会了用英语简单描述周围的人或者事物，会运用一些日常英语进行对话，还学唱了一些英文歌曲，你们一定感到很自豪吧！ 新学期开始，你们将和丹尼、詹妮还有李明一起，围绕感觉、动物以及健康生活等方面的话题，体验更多语言和文化，增长更多的英语知识和技能， 你们都迫不及待了吧！ 同学们，只要你们积极参与到听听、说说、唱唱和做做的活动中，就一定会发现——学英语真的是既容易又有趣！ 同学们，在英语学习中，你们要主动地听，积极地参与，敢于开口，勇于挑战，遇到困难大胆求助，这样，就一定能学好英语！ 致同 学 
CONTENTS Unit 1 How Do You Feel? ··············1 Unit 2 Animal Friends ·················17 Unit 3 My Day ·····························33 Unit 4 Healthy Me ·······················49 Word List ·········································65 Vocabulary ······································69 1 UNIT 1 Lessons 1~6 How Do You Feel?

At six o’clock, it’s time for dinner, but Danny goes to bed. “I will get up at seven o’clock tomorrow,” he says. “I will have a good day.” 5 7 6 8 All day, Danny feels early. At ten o’clock, he wants lunch. At two thirty, he is ready to go home. Think About It Why does Danny feel early all day? At 5:00 p.m., I go home. I have dinner with my family. After dinner, I wash the dishes and then I do my homework. I go to bed at 9:00 p.m. What time do you get up ? I get up at seven.

52 1 Eat and drink Lesson 20 Eat Good Food! I eat vegetables every day. They’re good for me. I drink lots of water. What do you eat for lunch ? I eat donuts. I eat hot dogs. 1 3 2 
I work hard at school. I play with my friends. 1 1 3 2 2 4 54 1 2 I have good habits Work and play Lesson 21 Good Habits I brush my teeth three times a day. I do exercise every day. I brush my hair every morning. I go to bed early every day. I have good habits.

content: I do my homework. I go for a walk with my parents. This is the way I brush my teeth, Early in the morning. This is the way I brush my hair, Early in the morning. This is the way I wash my hands, Early in the morning. This is the way I wash my face, Early in the morning. 3 4 55 B Let’s sing! 3 Let’s sing! 56 1 Happy Mother’s Day! 1 2 Lesson 22 Mother’s Day My mother works hard. She cooks every day. She cleans the house. She washes the clothes. Mother’s Day is coming. We want to do something for her. What can we do? I’d like to make a card for her. I’d like to make a nice breakfast for her. I can help you. That’s a great idea. I’d like to buy her a gift. 57 3 Happy Mother’s Day! Think and talk. What can you do for your mom on Mother’s Day? 2 Let’s do it! Dear Mom, You‛re the best mom. Thank you for everything. Love, Lynn, Jenny and Bob make a card cook a meal clean the house hug your mom

content: 58 1 A Saturday visit Lesson 23 Visiting Mrs. Zhou What would you like to do now, Grandma Zhou ? Hi Grandma Zhou. We have some fruit and vegetables for you. Thank you. I love fruit and vegetables. Let’s go for a walk. Let me tell you a story. Mrs. Zhou is very old. She has no family. We go to visit her every Saturday. We help her wash her clothes. We clean her room. We go for a walk together. Mrs. Zhou tells us a story. She is happy. We are happy, too. 1 2

content: 59 1. How do the students help Mrs. Zhou ? Read and tick. 2. Group work. Think and talk. They wash her clothes. They cook soup for her. They clean her room. They go for a walk with her. They read her a story. Do you help others ? What do you do ? I... clean the room wash clothes read books sing songs tell stories go for a walk 2 Let’s do it! Letters and sounds 3 i g g ood g irl do g an g ry k i te r i de r i ce l i ke Tongue Twister Mike likes to ride a bike and fly a kite. Try to read 60 1 2 4 5 3 Would you like some fruit ? I don’t feel good today. I think I’m ill. Lesson 24 A Little Monkey Let me help you. Yes, please! I’ll get some fruit for you. Wow! The apples look good. I’ll get some. Oh, oranges! I like oranges! I’ll get some. Story time Thank you!

content: 63 Shao Lin is a student. She is in Grade 3. She works hard at school. She plays basketball every week. At home, she helps her mother cook dinner and clean the house. 1. What grade is Shao Lin in? 2. What sport does she play every week? 3. What does she do at home? 4. Do you think Shao Lin is a healthy girl? 4 Read and talk 3 Look and write 1. In the evening, I ______________. 2. I ______________ on Saturday. 3. On Wednesday afternoon, I ______________ . 4. I ______________ in the morning. 5. I ______________ at home. 6. I ______________ on Sunday. fly a kite read a book play basketball sing a song do my homework watch TV 1 4 2 5 3 6
